# name

**Instance Property**

Returns the name of the named action.

## Declaration

```swift
var name: PDFActionNamedName { get set }
```

## Return Value

The name of the named action.

## Related Documentation

- **PDFActionNamed**: `PDFActionNamed` defines methods used to work with actions in PDF documents, some of which are named in the Adobe PDF Specification.
